attributes.action: Stop Immigration, to make Britain, British again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the increase of immigration, Britain is becoming less and less like Britain was. Many of these people only want to come here to ruin us through terrorism. Put an end to it now, before its too late.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop Immigration, to make Britain, British again."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16573


Prime Minister's Office
